content: lion brand pattern # 70628ad skill level beginner 450-325 jiffy yarn el paso 2 balls print crochet hook - size k-10 5 6 5 mm scarf is worked lengthwise finished in 5 row *lion brand note you will be adding extra stitches on each row of this pattern don t worry too much about counting stitches exactly your scarf will still be very ruffled *
